description: Returns information about a provisioning template. Requires permission to access the DescribeProvisioningTemplate action.

parameters.name: templateName
parameters.description: The name of the provisioning template.

nested_items.name: templateArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the provisioning template.

nested_items.name: templateName
nested_items.description: The name of the provisioning template.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the provisioning template.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date when the provisioning template was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date when the provisioning template was last modified.

nested_items.name: defaultVersionId
nested_items.description: The default fleet template version ID.

nested_items.name: templateBody
nested_items.description: The JSON formatted contents of the provisioning template.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: True if the provisioning template is enabled, otherwise false.

nested_items.name: provisioningRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role associated with the provisioning template. This IoT role grants permission to provision a device.

nested_items.name: preProvisioningHook
nested_items.description: Gets information about a pre-provisioned hook.

nested_items.name: payloadVersion
nested_items.description: The payload that was sent to the target function.

nested_items.name: targetArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the target function.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type you define in a provisioning template. You can create a template with only one type. You can't change the template type after its creation. The default value is FLEET_PROVISIONING. For more information about provisioning template, see: Provisioning template.
